To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Tristar _tristar;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_tristar = Tristar(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_tristar.IsReady)
{
    var period = _tristar.Period.Value;
    var current = _tristar.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.tristar = self.Tristar(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.tristar.IsReady:
    period = self.tristar.Period.Value
    current = self.tristar.Current.Value
